com.flowpowered.caustic.api.util

Class TextureAtlas

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.caustic.api.util.TextureAtlas

  • public class TextureAtlas
extends Object
    A utility class used to stitch together multiple textures as to reduce the textures used.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      class  TextureAtlas.RegionData
      Stores data for a region in the TextureAtlas

    • Method Detail

      • attachTo

        public void attachTo(Texture texture)
        Sets the image data of the provided Texture with the image data found in this TextureAtlas. This should be called after all textures have been added to the TextureAtlas.
        Parameters:
        texture - Texture to set image data

      • getTextureRegion

        public TextureAtlas.RegionData getTextureRegion(String name)
        Retrieves the TextureAtlas.RegionData which is stored under the provided name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the region
        Returns:
        The region data

      • addTexture

                       InputStream input)
                throws com.flowpowered.caustic.api.util.TextureAtlas.TextureTooBigException,
                       IOException
        Adds the provided texture from the InputStream into this TextureAtlas.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this Texture
        input - The InputStream of the texture
        Throws:
        com.flowpowered.caustic.api.util.TextureAtlas.TextureTooBigException
